text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza temukkirizibwa kusikira bakyala lwampaka, era temubanyigirizanga mube nga mutwala ebimu kwebyo byemwabawa, mpozzi nga bakoze obwenzi obweyolefu, (bwekiba ekyo) mukolagane nabo mu ngeri ennungi, bwe muba temukyabaagala, muyinza okutamwa ekintu ate Katonda naakissaamu ebirungi bingi
